name: The Swartbron
abilities: [{"description":"The engaged Creature with the lowest ☑ Courage fails all checks on attacks & plays.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"fail_checks_lowest_courage","notes":"Criatura engajada com menor Coragem falha em todos os testes.","payload":{"trigger":"on_combat","stat":"courage","condition":"lowest"}},"targetScope":"engaged_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: The Storw Turnel Lingering Monsoon
abilities: [{"description":"The engaged Creature with the lowest ☑ Speed plays attacks at random.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"attack_randomly_lowest_speed","notes":"Criatura engajada com menor Velocidade ataca aleatoriamente.","payload":{"trigger":"on_combat","stat":"speed","condition":"lowest"}},"targetScope":"engaged_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: The Passage Underworld
abilities: [{"description":"The first time a Creature loses an Elemental Type this turn it loses 10 Energy.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"lose_energy_on_element_loss","notes":"Perde energia ao perder um tipo elemental.","payload":{"trigger":"on_element_loss","amount":10},"usageLimitPerTurn":1},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: The Passage Overworld
abilities: [{"description":"The first time a Creature gains an Elemental Type this turn it gains 10 Energy.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_energy_on_element_gain","notes":"Ganha energia ao ganhar um tipo elemental.","payload":{"trigger":"on_element_gain","amount":10},"usageLimitPerTurn":1},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: The Garden
abilities: [{"description":"At the beginning of combat, all Creatures gain ☑ Water.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element","notes":"Todas as criaturas ganham Água no início do combate.","payload":{"trigger":"on_combat_start","keyword":"water"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: The Magma Dam
abilities: [{"description":"Creatures without ☐ Fire have \"Recklessness 5\".","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_keyword_if_condition","notes":"Ganha Recklessness se não tiver Fogo.","payload":{"trigger":"passive","keyword":"recklessness","amount":5,"condition":"without_element","condition_element":"fire"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Star Towers of Kehn-Sep
abilities: [{"description":"At the start of combat, the controller of the engaged Creature with the highest ☐ Wisdom may remove ☐ from a Creature they control. If they do, they may put ☐ on a Creature they control.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"move_mugic_counter_highest_wisdom","notes":"Move um contador de Mugic no início do combate.","payload":{"trigger":"on_combat_start","condition":"highest_wisdom"}},"targetScope":"own_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Tablet Sanctuary
abilities: [{"description":"At the beginning of combat, the engaged Creature with the most Elemental Types gains ☐.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_mugic_counter_most_elements","notes":"Ganha contador de Mugic se tiver mais elementos.","payload":{"trigger":"on_combat_start","amount":1,"condition":"most_elements"}},"targetScope":"engaged_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: The Golden Heptagon
abilities: [{"description":"Creatures can play Mugic of any Tribe or affiliation.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"ignore_mugic_tribe_restriction","notes":"Permite usar Mugic de qualquer tribo.","payload":{"trigger":"passive"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: The Cliffs
abilities: [{"description":"At the beginning of combat, all Creatures gain Earth.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element","notes":"Todas as criaturas ganham Terra no início do combate.","payload":{"trigger":"on_combat_start","keyword":"earth"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Rock River Canyon
abilities: [{"description":"Creatures with: Earth have an additional 10 Energy.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"stat_modifier_if_element","notes":"Ganha 10 de energia se tiver Terra.","payload":{"trigger":"passive","stat":"energy","amount":10,"condition":"has_element","condition_element":"earth"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Prexxor Chasm, The Blight
abilities: [{"description":"Non-Caretakers cannot be healed or gain Energy.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"prevent_heal_and_energy_gain","notes":"Não-Caretakers não podem ser curados ou ganhar energia.","payload":{"trigger":"passive","condition":"is_not_subtype","condition_subtype":"caretaker"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]},{"description":"Mirage: Creatures in this space have 20 less Energy.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"stat_modifier_mirage","notes":"Miragem: -20 de energia para criaturas no espaço.","payload":{"trigger":"passive","stat":"energy","amount":-20}},"targetScope":"creatures_in_location","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Riverlands, Abandoned Wastes
abilities: [{"description":"When Riverlands becomes the active Location, each player shuffles their attack hand into their Attack Deck and draws two Attack Cards.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"shuffle_hand_and_draw","notes":"Embaralha a mão de ataque e compra duas cartas.","payload":{"trigger":"on_location_activate","draw_count":2}},"targetScope":"all_players","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Rao'Pa Sahkk, Condensation Ceremony
abilities: [{"description":"Creatures without Water cannot spend Magic counters to play Magic or abilities.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"prevent_mugic_usage_without_element","notes":"Impede o uso de contadores de Mugic sem Água.","payload":{"trigger":"passive","condition":"without_element","condition_element":"water"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Mount Pillar Reservoir, Liberated
abilities: [{"description":"When Mount Pillar Reservoir is revealed, each player infects an Uninfected Creature he or she controls.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"infect_creature_on_reveal","notes":"Infecta uma criatura de cada jogador ao revelar o local.","payload":{"trigger":"on_location_reveal"}},"targetScope":"all_players","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Mipedim Tropics
abilities: [{"description":"Mipedians have ☑ Water and ☑ Water 5.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element_and_keyword","notes":"Mipedians ganham Água e Água 5.","payload":{"trigger":"passive","elements":["water"],"keywords":[{"name":"water","value":5}]}},"targetScope":"specific_tribes","targetTribes":["mipedian"]}]

name: Prexxor Chasm
abilities: [{"description":"At the beginning of the turn, choose a Creature your opponent controls and they choose a Creature you control. Relocate your Creature to the chosen Creature's space and begin combat. This does not count toward your combat limit for the turn.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"force_combat_at_turn_start","notes":"Força um combate no início do turno.","payload":{"trigger":"on_turn_start"}},"targetScope":"all_players","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Mipedim Valley
abilities: [{"description":"Creatures without ☐ Air do not flip-up their Battlegear at the start of combat.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"prevent_battlegear_flip_without_element","notes":"Impede o flip do Battlegear sem Ar.","payload":{"trigger":"on_combat_start","condition":"without_element","condition_element":"air"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Najarin's Castle
abilities: [{"description":"When Najarin's Castle becomes the active Location, each player may discard a Mugic Card. If they do, they may return a Mugic Card from their general discard pile to their hand.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"recycle_mugic_card","notes":"Recicla uma carta de Mugic ao ativar o local.","payload":{"trigger":"on_location_activate"}},"targetScope":"all_players","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Lake Ken-I-Po, Ritual Site
abilities: [{"description":"Creatures cannot gain or lose Elemental Types. (Creatures cannot pay costs that require losing an Elemental Type)","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"prevent_elemental_type_change","notes":"Impede ganho ou perda de tipos elementais.","payload":{"trigger":"passive"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Kaizerh, City of the Mipedians
abilities: [{"description":"Creatures take 5 less damage from attacks they share an Elemental Type with.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"damage_reduction_shared_element","notes":"Reduz o dano de ataques com elemento em comum.","payload":{"trigger":"on_damage_calculation","amount":-5,"condition":"shared_element"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Kiru Village
abilities: [{"description":"Past Creatures have an additional 10 Energy.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"stat_modifier_for_tribe","notes":"Criaturas 'Past' ganham 10 de energia.","payload":{"trigger":"passive","stat":"energy","amount":10}},"targetScope":"specific_tribes","targetTribes":["past"]}]

name: Gigantemporis, Chamber of the Oraklon
abilities: [{"description":"Battlegear has \"Untargetable\".","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_keyword_battlegear","notes":"Battlegear ganha 'Untargetable'.","payload":{"trigger":"passive","keyword":"untargetable"}},"targetScope":"all_battlegear","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Graalorn Forest
abilities: [{"description":"When a Creature plays an Elemental attack, heal 5 damage to that Creature.","effectType":"heal","battleRules":{"type":"heal_on_elemental_attack","notes":"Cura 5 de dano ao usar um ataque elemental.","payload":{"trigger":"on_elemental_attack_play","amount":5}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Herken's Feast
abilities: [{"description":"The first attack each Creature plays this combat is reduced by 20 damage.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"damage_reduction_first_attack","notes":"Reduz o dano do primeiro ataque em 20.","payload":{"trigger":"on_first_attack","amount":-20}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Dranakis Threshold
abilities: [{"description":"All Creatures are considered Past Creatures.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"set_tribe_to_past","notes":"Todas as criaturas são consideradas da tribo Past.","payload":{"trigger":"passive"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]},{"description":"Creatures have no Tribes. (Creatures without a Tribe can cast Generic Mugic only)","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"remove_all_tribes","notes":"Criaturas não têm tribo.","payload":{"trigger":"passive"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Elmantiir
abilities: [{"description":"At the beginning of combat, engaged Creatures gain 5 Energy for each Elemental Type they have.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_energy_per_element","notes":"Ganha 5 de energia por tipo elemental no início do combate.","payload":{"trigger":"on_combat_start","amount_per_element":5}},"targetScope":"engaged_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: City of Kehn-Sep, Tablet Dig Site
abilities: [{"description":"At the beginning of combat, each player reveals the top 2 cards in their Attack Deck. Any player who reveals 3 or more total Build Cost in attacks puts ☐ on their engaged Creature. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of the Attack Deck in any order.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"gain_mugic_on_attack_reveal","notes":"Ganha contador de Mugic com base no custo de construção das cartas de ataque reveladas.","payload":{"trigger":"on_combat_start","reveal_count":2,"build_cost_threshold":3}},"targetScope":"all_players","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Castle Rathwag
abilities: [{"description":"The engaged Creature with the lowest Power deals 5 less damage with attacks.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"damage_reduction_lowest_power","notes":"Criatura engajada com menor Poder causa 5 a menos de dano.","payload":{"trigger":"on_damage_calculation","amount":-5,"condition":"lowest_power"}},"targetScope":"engaged_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: A'zaja Mindscrying Chamber
abilities: [{"description":"When A'zaja Mindscrying Chamber is revealed, Creatures lose all Elemental Types.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"lose_all_elements_on_reveal","notes":"Criaturas perdem todos os tipos elementais ao revelar o local.","payload":{"trigger":"on_location_reveal"}},"targetScope":"all_creatures","targetTribes":[]}]

name: Castle Mommark
abilities: [{"description":"When Castle Mommark becomes the active Location each player, may sacrifice a Creature they control. If they do, they may return another Creature from their general discard pile to any unoccupied space on their side of the Battleboard.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"sacrifice_to_revive_creature","notes":"Sacrifica uma criatura para reviver outra da pilha de descarte.","payload":{"trigger":"on_location_activate","requiresEmptySpace":true}},"targetScope":"all_players","targetTribes":[]}]
